name: Buggy.Operation.Bot
description:
UNFORTUNATELY i got no time to finish this game so i'll just send it this way but might fnish outside of jam one day so yeah...

i also made a song that was supposed to be in the game so you can play it in the bg if you want

first of all - i know you can control the player, but that's part of the story so keep playing! :P

the game was made in a week using gdevelop for ninja game jam #2 (theme: you control the game, not the player)
